summary: Completed e2e testing of Admin Orders and Revenue tracking features. All 13 backend tests passed. All frontend UI tests passed. Admin can login, view dashboard with revenue stats, navigate to Orders page, use search/filter functionality.
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: AuthContext.jsx has ESLint warning about missing dependency 'fetchUser' in useEffect - not blocking but should be addressed
seed_data_creation: Created test mentee users during backend tests for role-based access testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin revenue tracking feature fully tested. 2 pending orders exist in database (Shivansh Bajpai and Test User). Revenue shows â‚¹0 because no orders are marked as 'paid' yet. Razorpay is using LIVE keys (rzp_live_S8Pnnj923wxaob).

features_verified.dashboard_revenue_stats: PASS - Total Revenue and Total Orders cards displayed
features_verified.dashboard_revenue_by_plan: PASS - Revenue by Plan section present (shows 'No revenue data yet' as expected)
features_verified.dashboard_recent_orders: PASS - Recent Orders section present (shows 'No orders yet' as expected)

features_verified.orders_table: PASS - Orders table displays with Customer, Plan, Amount, Status, Payment ID, Date columns

features_verified.orders_filters: PASS - All, Paid, Pending filter tabs work correctly
features_verified.payment_id_column: PASS - Payment ID column visible in orders table
